Articles.Content:
So I installed the "Sunflares of maar" mod and used the "phi" sunflare  and the sunflare is working normally but I still see the sun itself inside the flare

images --- > https://imgur.com/a/VtD3Oya

logs --- > https://drive.google.com/file/d/1T-VUMAHQQVFuuw4hFofNd6K5iA5c0Q2h/view?usp=sharing

On 10/30/2021 at 9:24 AM, Awesomesauce1337 said:

So I installed the "Sunflares of maar" mod and used the "phi" sunflare  and the sunflare is working normally but I still see the sun itself inside the flare

images --- > https://imgur.com/a/VtD3Oya

logs --- > https://drive.google.com/file/d/1T-VUMAHQQVFuuw4hFofNd6K5iA5c0Q2h/view?usp=sharing

@Awesomesauce1337 Did you ever solve this problem with Sunflares Of Maar? I'm trying to use the Ursa Minor flare and have the same problem of the sunball looking like it's pasted in front of the flare.

@DeadJohn as you seem to have gotten this working, I presume you already know the syntax version thing you have to do in the config file. In that same file, change the first number in %flareSettings to 1 from 0.5

it will look like: %flareSettings = 1,1,0.8

Hope this helps!

10 hours ago, Benzo Kerman said:

@DeadJohn as you seem to have gotten this working, I presume you already know the syntax version thing you have to do in the config file. In that same file, change the first number in %flareSettings to 1 from 0.5

it will look like: %flareSettings = 1,1,0.8

Hope this helps!

The brightness increased to 1 or higher looks better but still way worse than the Ursa Minor sample screenshot. I've made further changes by merging some sun cfg settings from JNSQ with Ursa Minor's flare images and got something that's much improved.

Note that I don't need "SyntaxVersion = 1" with GPP and Sunflares of Maar. Both mods use the original Scatterer syntax so properly default to 1. Explicit syntax is only needed when mixing sun patches that use different syntaxes.
Wow this is one old thread, DeadJohn unfortunately I never fixed this issue as I moved to JNSQ.

TO ALL WHO HAVE HAD THIS ISSUE AND TO THOSE WHO WILL IN THE FUTURE

I FOUND A FIX

Ensure that your "flareSettings" line in the scatterer config has 1 be the first number E.G: flareSettings = 0.7,1,0.5 -> flareSettings = 1,1,0.5

This fixed my problem and may fix yours.

@Awesomesauce1337 My sunflare doesn't even work at all. Granted I haven't tried your fix you posted on March 12th, but for some odd reason, the scatterer stock sunflare completely overwrites my install of the Ursa Minor flare

Like the game isn't even recognizing that I have it installed

@SkinnyThePimp

I had the same issue, what I had to do was replace the default sunflare images located in "Scatterer\config\Sunflares\Sun" with the Ursa Minor ones. IE: Replace the default "sunflare.png" with the Ursa Minor "sunflare.png" and repeat for every image like the ghosts. Then ensure the flareSettings line has the proper numbers. 

If this doesn't work, try using my sun.cfg file, create a new cfg file by creating a txt file, pasting in my settings and renaming the file extension to cfg, then replace the default sun.cfg with the new file.

https://pastebin.com/vc1S965W

 

Edited March 20 by Awesomesauce1337

37 minutes ago, Awesomesauce1337 said:

@SkinnyThePimp

https://pastebin.com/vc1S965W

 

It works! Thanks so much dude I really appreciate it @Awesomesauce1337

You're welcome.

Welcome to the forums BTW. Hope you enjoy it here!

You're welcome.
